title: Stained Glass Summer
description: Twelve-year-old Jasmine adores her photographer Father and wants to be an artist just like him. But when Dad abandons the family, Jasmine is sent to spend the summer with her Uncle on a Pacific Northwest Island. Soon, Jasmine is learning stained glass from island glass artist, Opal, and thinking she might just be developing a crush on Island boy, Cole. But, itâ€™s not until Jasmine finds herself mentoring another young artist that she can truly let go of her Father and call herself an artist by her own terms.The story will appeal to young readers between the ages of 8-12.
author: Mindy Hardwick
